data.name: Pixel Game Maker MV - low.res Sci Fi Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Make your very own top down sci-fi game with PGMMV!
Will you create an action-packed adventure game, or a mystery set in a dystopian future?
It's all up to you and how you take advantage of your assets! Use them as-is or customize them to your liking; the only limit is your imagination!

The low.res SciFi Starter Pack contains a basic set of pixel art assets and a sample project.
Details of the contents :

  • 8 Character Sprites
    • 1 Player Character
    • 5 Enemy Characters (Includes one forward only facing boss type)
    • 2 Static Non Playable Characters
  • 5 Tilesheets (16x16)
  • Bullets & Effects
  • Basic UI and HUD Assets
Project file with basic gameplay and logic
The assets are made to be used exclusively with Pixel Game Maker MV.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
